text: it's a power tool that becomes part of
your hand and you can use it to shape
hot materials like wood and stone the
benefit is the haptic feedback you know
that the feedback I could get from
actually following the curve why are you
creating it when I try to make organic
shapes myself and I thought that a
chisel is not that's not the right tool
to do that you need something that is
actually much more controllable much
more intuitive you literally just hold
the object in your hand and start
calming it around and you don't need to
put it in a vise or anything you don't
need a workshop you don't need any
special tools I've tested it with wood
and stone it's not dangerous because
it's just abrasives and it's relatively
low power I think it enables a new type
of craft a new shape development process
